subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This is a preparatory assistance project to PAPP funded by BCPR (CIDA). The preparatory assistance activities aim to mainstream CDA/CPR analysis into PAPPs  and key counterparts' programming by means of training and also by means of identifying entrypoints for CDA/CPR programming to be assessed and further developed. The key to doing so will be the recruitment of a PDA and Gender advisor.
subproject.title: Conflict Development Analysis
